instantiate.title: InstantiateMsg
instantiate.description: This structure describes the parameters used for creating a contract.

token_factory_addr.description: Token factory module address. Contract creator must ensure that the address is exact token factory module address.

execute.title: ExecuteMsg
execute.description: This structure describes the execute messages available in the contract.

oneOf.description: Deposits ASTRO in exchange for xASTRO The receiver is optional. If not set, the sender will receive the xASTRO.
Burns xASTRO in exchange for ASTRO

query.title: QueryMsg
query.description: This structure describes the query messages available in the contract.

oneOf.description: Config returns the contract configuration specified in a custom [`Config`] structure
Returns xASTRO total supply. Duplicates TotalSupplyAt { timestamp: None } logic but kept for backward compatibility.
Returns total ASTRO staked in the contract
BalanceAt returns xASTRO balance of the given address at at the given timestamp. Returns current balance if unset if timestamp unset.
TotalSupplyAt returns xASTRO total token supply at the given timestamp. Returns current total supply if timestamp unset.

balance_at.title: Uint128

config.title: Config
config.description: This structure stores the main parameters for the staking contract.

total_deposit.title: Uint128

total_shares.title: Uint128

total_supply_at.title: Uint128

tracker_config.title: TrackerData
tracker_config.description: This structure stores the tracking contract data.
